TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ServiceDescription extends System.Web.Services.Description.NamedItem
Public NotInheritable Class ServiceDescription Inherits NamedItem

summary.span: 提供方法建立和格式化具有適當命名空間 (Namespace)、項目和屬性 (Attribute) 的有效 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 文件檔案，以便用於描述 XML Web Service。

span.span: Provides a means of creating and formatting a valid Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document file, complete with appropriate namespaces, elements, and attributes, for describing an XML Web service.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以建立這個類別的執行個體，其中一種`new`關鍵字或靜態方法，這個方法會剖析 WSDL 檔案，並將其值指派給類別的適當成員。Instances of this class can be created with either the `new` keyword or the static method, which parses a WSDL file and assigns its values to appropriate members of the class. WSDL 是以 XML 為基礎的語言來描述 XML Web 服務。WSDL is an XML-based language for describing XML Web services. 類別會對應到根項目`definitions`，WSDL 檔案。The class corresponds to the root element, `definitions`, of a WSDL file. 如需有關 WSDL 的詳細資訊，請參閱規格的http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立 類別的執行個體。The following example shows how to create an instance of the class. [!code-cpp[ServiceDescription#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescription/CPP/servicedescription.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ServiceDescription#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescription/CS/servicedescription.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ServiceDescription#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescription/VB/servicedescription.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回此屬性會對應至清單`binding`括住的 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 項目`definitions`根項目。The returned by this property corresponds to the list of `binding` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element. 如需有關 WSDL 的詳細資訊，請參閱規格的http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/. ## Examples [!code-cpp[ServiceDescription_Bindings#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescription_Bindings/CPP/servicedescription_bindings.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ServiceDescription_Bindings#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescription_Bindings/CS/servicedescription_bindings.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ServiceDescription_Bindings#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescription_Bindings/VB/servicedescription_bindings.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得 XML 序列化程式，用於在 物件與 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 文件之間，進行序列化和還原序列化。

span.span: Gets the XML serializer used to serialize and deserialize between a object and a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

value.span: XML 序列化程式，用於在 物件與 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 文件之間，進行序列化和還原序列化。

span.span: The XML serializer used to serialize and deserialize between a object and a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 序列化程式可以使用衍生自抽象類別自訂類別。The XML serializer can be customized using classes derived from the abstract class. 這些類別會指定在組態檔案，使用`serviceDescriptionFormatExtensionTypes`項目和其子系`add`項目。These classes are specified in a configuration file using the `serviceDescriptionFormatExtensionTypes` element and its child `add` element. 發行 Web 服務的 ASP.NET Web 應用程式，就可以套用設定。The configuration can be applied to an ASP.NET Web application that publishes a Web service.
